text: Deborra - Lee Furness net worth : Deborra - Lee Furness is an Australian actress, producer, and director who has a net worth of $ 10 million. Deborra - Lee Furness was born in Sydney, New South Wales, Australia in December 1955. She studied at the American Academy of Dramatic Arts in New York City. Furness starred as Louisa Correlli in the television series Correlli in 1995. She starred as Dolores Kennedy in the TV series Fire from 1995 to 1996. She has starred in the movies Crossover Dreams, Jenny Kissed Me, Cool Change, The Humpty Dumpty Man, The Bit Part, Shame, Two Brothers Running, Celia, The Last of the Finest, Voyager, Waiting, Newsies, Angel Baby, The Real Mac
